body_html:
Well, here is one reason we want to discuss on this +constant idea before doing it:
Additional not-so-easy concept for users to understand to use sparse. For example, two sparse tensors can’t just add together in a straightforward way, which may confuse users.

Additionally, we are diverging more with standard sparse formats. But I guess this isn’t too much a problem because we are always a superset of coo matrices. :)

body:
Well, here is one reason we want to discuss on this +constant idea before doing it:
Additional not-so-easy concept for users to understand to use sparse. For example, two sparse tensors can’t just add together in a straightforward way, which may confuse users. 

Additionally, we are diverging more with standard sparse formats. But I guess this isn’t too much a problem because we are always a superset of coo matrices. :)
